text: Nevzhe do nykh ne diyshla zvistka pro tykh, yaki zhyly ranishe — pro narod Nukha, adytiv, samudytiv, narod Ibrahima, zhyteliv Madʺyanu ta perekynutykh selyshch? Prykhodyly do nykh poslantsi yikhni z yasnymy znamennyamy. Allah ne buv nespravedlyvyy do nykh — vony sami buly nespravedlyvi do sebe
